name: OnPlayerLeaveRaceCheckpoint
notes: This callback can also be called by NPC.
description: This callback is called when a player leaves the race checkpoint.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that left the race checkpoint.

return_values: It is always called first in filterscripts.
